summary: iXe, a young hip-hop writer, has close friends who all believe in his talent.
cast: Disiz|Béatrice Dalle|Alex Descas|Vincent Elbaz|Jean-Pierre Cassel|Simon Abkarian|Léa Drucker|Edouard Montoute|Simon Buret|Adrien Saint-Joré|Youssef Diawara|Ali Karamoko|Blandine Bury|Firmine Richard|Tony Harrisson|Khalid Maadour|Bernard Chéron|Mauricette Gourdon|Sara Martins|Nancy Marie-Claire
title: Dans tes rêves
